entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 11:48 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
